title: The InflaTrend Reduction Act 8/16: Fentanyl, Election Day, Blunts, Quiet Quitting, Manti Te'o, ITT
itunes:title: The InflaTrend Reduction Act 8/16: Fentanyl, Election Day, Blunts, Quiet Quitting, Manti Te'o, ITT
description:
In this edition of The InflaTrend Reduction Act, Jack and Miles discuss Fox News discovering the existence of Fentanyl, the lack of NBA games on Election Day, Draymond Green's day of Holy Bluntrimony, the culture of Quiet Quitting, the upcoming Netflix doc on the Manti Te'o, and Joe Biden forgiving student debt... for people defrauded by ITT Tech!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
